name: Squarbe
description:
Squarbe is a sandbox platformer where you can build structures, explore dimensions, encounter weird creatures, and more.

-----------------------------------

WASD to Move

Shift or Q to Kick

Left Click to Break Blocks

Right Click to Place Blocks

E to Open Inventory

R to Cycle Through Block Variations

V to Fly (in freebuild mode)

Alt + Enter to toggle fullscreen

-----------------------------------

Squarbe Forums: https://squarbe.boards.net/

Squarbe OST: https://soundcloud.com/barfy3d/sets/squarbe-ost

Discord: https://discord.gg/NGM763rwrv
